card.subtitle: SRE/Linux System Administrator
card.text: Certified Linux SysAdmin, Certified Kubernetes Administrator, Automation, Infrastructure as code, Cloud enthusiast.

who.title: What I do?
who.text1: Linux (LPIC-1) and Kubernetes (CKA) certified, I also have a solid foundation in automation and infrastructure as code, using tools such as (Ansible, Shell, Python and Terraform).
who.text2: Expert in containerization technologies, configuring and maintaining Kubernetes environments, cluster management with VMware Tanzu/Tanzu Mission Control. Management of containerized environments with Docker/Podman/Containerd.
who.text3: Experienced in the administration of Linux environments, specifically RHEL and Ubuntu. Configuring various services such as httpd, networkmanager, firewalld, iptables and applications such as Tomcat, Weblogic, php-fpm, etc...
who.text4: Currently focused on expanding (SRE) and DevOps skills within public cloud environments. I consider myself a professional committed to collaborative problem solving and driving excellence in the IT field.
who.text5: I also have experience as a Web Developer, which makes it easier for me to create and modify code.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.text5: Linux, Rhel, Ansible, Ansible Automation Platform, Terraform, Tomcat, Apache, Nginx, Mysql.
tech.text6: Kubernetes, VMware Tanzu, Docker, Podman, Containerd, Helm.
tech.text8: Git, Gitlab, pip, Hashicorp Vault, Grafana.
